attributes.action: remove the charitable status of independant schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Independant or private schools are companies.  The government provides education free of charge to children.  Because of this, they are permitted to purchase essential items free from VAT.  Why should companies such as  private schools, who single out only the best to be educated and refuse to allow any persons who may not achieve high grades, also get VAT-free purchases?
